analysis.key_quote: Making every employee serve 'at will' is an invitation to disaster, an opportunity for corruption, cronyism, & severely diminished quality of service to the citizens of this country.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of the current civil service protections and expressing concerns about the potential for corruption and diminished service quality if employees are made 'at will'. This aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process.
